General.Name: Amplify Energy Corp
General.Description: Amplify Energy Corp., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the acquisition, development, exploitation, and production of oil and natural gas properties in the United States. The company's assets consist primarily of producing oil and natural gas properties located in Oklahoma, the Rockies, federal waters offshore Southern California, East Texas/North Louisiana, and Eagle Ford. Its properties include operated and non-operated working interests in producing and undeveloped leasehold acreage, as well as working interests in identified producing wells. The company is headquartered in Houston, Texas.
General.Address: 500 Dallas Street, Houston, TX, United States, 77002
